pages.title: Lab Coats
pages.text: A color scientist such as yourself really should have one of these if they want to be responsible while they work.$(br2)$(o)Note the $(item)Thornatologist's Blackcoat$(nocolor) requires $(l:https://modrinth.com/mod/roses-thorntilities)Rose's Thorntilities$(/l) to be survival-obtainable.$()

pages.title: (Plain) Lab Coat
pages.text: $(o)Doesn't give much protection, but at least you look cooler$()

pages.title: Thornatologist's
pages.text: $(o)Turns out the literal $(item)void$() doesn't mix well with a white lab coat...$()

pages.title: Tail Variants
pages.text: Press the button below to gain access to the 'tailed' lab coat variants, which are lifted up at the back in case you have a player model with a tail (via $(l:https://modrinth.com/mod/ears)Ears$(/l), $(l:https://modrinth.com/mod/figura)Figura$(/l), etc).$(br)Simply place any lab coat in the pigment pedestal to craft or decraft its tailed variant.
